item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Warren Ellis
item.description: "Be authentic to your dreams. Be authentic to your own idea about yourself. Grind away at your own minds and bodies until you become your own invention. Be Mad Scientists." -- Warren Ellis

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Warren Ellis
item.description: "If you believe that your thoughts originate inside your brain, do you also believe that television shows are made inside your television set?" -- Warren Ellis

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Warren Ellis
Jennifer add a quote by Mary Roach
item.description: "All good research-whether for science or for a book-is a form of obsession." -- Mary Roach

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mary Roach
item.description: "Footnote: In 1998, a woman in Saline, Michigan received a patent for a Decorative Penile Wrap...The patent included three pages of drawings, including a penis wearing a ghost outfit, another in the robes of the Grim Reaper, and one dressed up to look like a snowman. " -- Mary Roach

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "The tears I feel today I'll wait to shed tomorrow. Though I'll not sleep this night Nor find surcease from sorrow. My eyes must keep their sight: I dare not be tear-blinded. I must be free to talk Not choked with grief, clear-minded. My mouth cannot betray The anguish that I know. Yes, I'll keep my tears til later: But my grief will never go." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You get what anybody gets - you get a lifetime." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "What the hell happened to Pluto?!" -- Jay Asher
